descriptions:
['DescriptionBeautifully appointed 5 bedrooms C1 property that exemplifies why this layout is the best in the area.
This property is located on a leafy street within walking distance to the Els Golf Club and community pool. Estella park facing, the views from the back bedrooms are magical. Lush landscaping and mature trees frame the stream in the park picture complete with pretty bridge and weeping willows dangling from above.
The side entrance of the house leads into a bright foyer (the main door has been changed to include windows to allow light to flood the entrance). A family room to the left overlooks the front of the house and an upgraded powder room to the right adds immediate value to the property.
The bright lounge/dining area overlooks the garden and flows through to the beautifully upgraded kitchen which has integrated Siemens appliances and an extended kitchen island. The color palette is modern and fresh, the kitchen is the focal point of the villa, it’s where the family congregates daily and the parties happen regularly.
Downstairs there is also an en suite bedroom, storage space, and extended utility/maids room.
Upstairs there are 4 bedrooms, 2 of which share a bathroom that overlook the front of the villa and the master and guest bedrooms overlook the garden and both have spacious en suite bathrooms.
Led lights together with a low maintenance garden equal lower Dewa bills than the average villa in this sought-after area.
The pool is the right size and the villa is beautifully maintained. 
Please call me Katie Savage, The Urban Nest  to view, this property will not be on the market for long - +971507151741']

["DescriptionThe Valley's first villa / Townhouse community, Eden is designed to elevate your every day.
3- & 4-bedroom villas in three architectural styles.
YOUR EVERY WHIM, WITHIN REACH
Just a 5-minute walk from Eden, The Pavilion will offer an impressive array of retail and leisure experiences for the very first residents at The Valley, including bicycle tracks, kids' play areas, a zen garden, and much more. There wil be something for your every day at Eden.
THE LIFESTYLE OF YOUR DREAM AWAITS
At The Valley, Emaar has put together its finest minds to bring you the best-in-class family amenities that have never been seen before in the region.
With well-shaded walkable streets, generous green spaces and an array of exceptional amenities, you and your loved ones will live the lifestyle you have always dreamed of.
The Valley is envisioned as a new quaint town.
It is comprised of a network of residential neighbourhoods through tributaries of lush greenery, forging a network of green open spaces and best-in-class community amenities that have never before been seen in the region.
The design concept stems from the desire to establish a strong sense of community family living, equipped with retail, entertainment, recreational, educational and health facilities.
This makes The Valley the perfect place for residents and their loved ones to power their dreams, becoming the next generation of UAE’s innovators and change-makers.
The Valley by Emaar is a Freehold property in Dubai with 100% ownership and a title deed that allows you to get residency visa in Dubai. Easy instalment plan with no interest.
